description: This file defines the EventController class within a Laravel application, handling API endpoints related to event management such as listing, creating, updating, and deleting events, as well as managing invitations and statistics.

classes.name: EventController
classes.description: Controller class managing API endpoints for event-related operations such as listing, creating, updating, deleting events, and handling invitations and statistics.

methods.name: index
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all events.

methods.name: store
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new event.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific event by ID.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove an event by ID.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Handles PUT/PATCH requests to update an existing event.

methods.name: getEventStats
methods.description: Retrieves statistics for a specific event.

methods.name: getManagerEvents
methods.description: Retrieves events managed by the current user.

methods.name: getEventByUID
methods.description: Retrieves an event by its UID.

methods.name: getInvitation
methods.description: Retrieves a specific invitation by ID.

methods.name: getInvitations
methods.description: Retrieves invitations for a specific event.

methods.name: getManagerEventById
methods.description: Retrieves a managed event by ID.
